name: To Their Salvation
description:
Created for the Brackeys GameJam 2022.2, with the theme "You're Not Alone".  Explore the spooky forest and save lost villagers by taking them to the cave.

Controls

WASD, arrows or left  joystick to move.

Credits

Kar Wah - Main Programming, Game design, Level design - https://thechineseguy.itch.io/

MUG - Additional programming, Game design -  https://mug806.itch.io/

ART-FUN2XZ - Art, Level design - https://art-fun-games.itch.io/

Sodaguyz - Soundtrack and SFX - https://sodaguyz.itch.io/

Gallow - Art and Design - https://gallowjolt.itch.io/

Cyan "CyF" Flower - Additional Art - https://cyan-cyf-flower.itch.io/
